verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's reckless rhetoric and aggressive policy against immigrants] [V: turned] [ARG2: deadly] [ARGM-TMP: after a U.S. Customs and Border Patrol agent shot and killed a migrant woman along the U.S .- Mexico border on Wednesday] , [ARGM-ADV: according to officials] .

President Donald Trump 's reckless rhetoric and aggressive policy against immigrants turned deadly after [ARG0: a U.S. Customs and Border Patrol agent] [V: shot] and killed [ARG1: a migrant woman] [ARGM-LOC: along the U.S .- Mexico border] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-ADV: according to] officials .

President Donald Trump 's reckless rhetoric and aggressive policy against immigrants turned deadly after [ARG0: a U.S. Customs and Border Patrol agent] shot and [V: killed] [ARG1: a migrant woman] [ARGM-LOC: along the U.S .- Mexico border] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , according to officials .

President Donald Trump 's reckless rhetoric and aggressive policy against immigrants turned deadly after a U.S. Customs and Border Patrol agent shot and killed a migrant woman along the U.S .- Mexico border on Wednesday , [V: according] to officials .
